member.name: M:Microsoft.Azure.AppService.AppServiceClientExtensions.LoginAsync(Microsoft.Azure.AppService.IAppServiceClient,Android.Content.Context,System.String,System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary{System.String,System.String})
member.summary: Log a user into AppService based app given a provider name.
member.param: The AppServiceClient instance to login with.
The Context to display the Login UI in.
The name of the authentication provider to use.
Provider specific extra parameters that are sent as query string parameters to login endpoint.
member.returns: Task that will complete when the user has finished authentication.
